messages.text: That's when they had just taken them
She's handcuffed and pressed against a wall next to her friend
Her parents must be happy she's alive, at least.
Who knows if she's still alive
It's impossible to know what they're doing to her there
Now they'll know everything about us
True, but she's worth much more to them alive than dead. She's a bargaining chip
If they shot the cameras, they already know enough anyway
